00059 class ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest {
00060 
00061 public:
00062   int numPassed, numFailed;
00063   std::string testDir;
00064   ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest() {
00065     numPassed = 0;
00066     numFailed = 0;
00067   }
00068 
00069   
00070   void doMultiChannelAxiom();
00071     void doBirdseedSnp6Spf();
00072   string createString(const char **items, int size, const char *prefix, const char *suffix);

00076 string ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest::createString(const char **items, int size, const char *prefix, const char *suffix) {
00077     string val = "";
00078     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00079         val = val + prefix + items[i] + suffix;
00080     }
00081     return val;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest::doBirdseedSnp6Spf() {
00085   string outdir = testDir + "/qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf";
00086   string command = "./apt-probeset-genotype-stages "
00087     "--table-output "
00088     "--analysis birdseed "
00089     "--use-disk=false "
00090     "--special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs "
00091     "--spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.SNP_A-4232288.spf "
00092     "--read-models-birdseed ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.birdseed.models "
00093     "-o " + outdir + " "
00094     "--cel-files ../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno/GenomeWideSNP_6/fas_cel_files.txt";
00095 
00096   string name = "qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf";
00097   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00098 
00099   // AW: enough flux in what is going in the report file that we are not going
00100   //     to check it for every test. just some of the tests.
00101   // checks for report file
00102   //checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(testDir + "/qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.report.txt",
00103   //                                 "../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno/GenomeWideSNP_6/doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.report.txt",
00104   //                                 0.00001,
00105   //                                 1,2, false, 0));
00106   // checks for the table files.
00107   checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(testDir + "/qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.calls.txt",
00108                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno/GenomeWideSNP_6/doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.calls.txt",
00109                                    0.0000001,
00110                                    1, 1, false, 0));
00111   checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(testDir + "/qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.confidences.txt",
00112                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno/GenomeWideSNP_6/doBirdseedSnp6Spf/birdseed.confidences.txt",
00113                                    0.0003,
00114                                    1, 1, false, 0)); // currently 173 nan's in file
00115 
00116   RegressionTest birdseedTest(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00117   //  birdseedTest.setSuite(*this, outdir, outdir + "/apt-probeset-genotype.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00118 
00119   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00120   if(!birdseedTest.pass()) {
00121     Verbose::out(1, "Error in ProbeSetGenotypeTest::" + name + "(): " + birdseedTest.getErrorMsg());
00122     numFailed++;
00123   }
00124   else {
00125     numPassed++;
00126   }
00127 }

00129 void ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest::doMultiChannelAxiom() {
00130 
00131   const char *file_prefixes[] = {
00132     "NA07029_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_B11_v1",
00133     "NA07034_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_A05_v1",
00134     "NA10831_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_D06_v1",
00135     "NA11831_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_G03_v1",
00136     "NA11839_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_A03_v1",
00137     "NA11882_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_H04_v1",
00138     "NA11993_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_G06_v1",
00139     "NA12716_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_E01_v1",
00140     "NA12801_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_D09_v1",
00141     "NA12813_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_E08_v1",
00142     "NA12874_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_E04_v1",
00143     "NA12892_AxiomGWASHuSNP1_20090812_MCKI_T01_B12_v1",
00144   NULL
00145   };
00146 
00147   std::string idata="../../../regression-data/data/idata";
00148 
00149   string name = "doMultiChannelAxiom";
00150   string command = "./apt-probeset-genotype-stages"
00151     " -a artifact-reduction.ResType=2.Clip=0.4.Close=2.Open=2.Fringe=4.CC=2,quant-norm.target=1000.sketch=5000,pm-only,brlmm-p.CM=1.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.lambda=1.0.HARD=3.SB=0.75.transform=MVA.copyqc=0.00000.wobble=0.05.MS=0.15.copytype=-1.clustertype=2.ocean=0.00001.CSepPen=0.1.CSepThr=4"
00152     " --qmethod-spec med-polish.expon=true"
00153     " --set-gender-method cn-probe-chrXY-ratio"
00154     " --em-gender false"
00155     " --female-thresh 0.54"
00156     " --male-thresh 1.0"
00157     " --cc-chp-output"
00158     " --chip-type Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP"
00159     " --chip-type Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2"
00160     " --set-analysis-name AxiomGT1"
00161     " --out-dir " + testDir + "/doMultiChannelAxiom"
00162     " --force"
00163     " --read-models-brlmmp "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.AxiomGT1.models")+
00164     " --spf-file "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.spf")+
00165     " --special-snps "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.specialSNPs ")+
00166     " --chrX-probes "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.chrXprobes")+
00167     " --chrY-probes "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.chrYprobes")+
00168     " --target-sketch "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.AxiomGT1.sketch")+
00169     " --use-feat-eff "+Fs::Unc(idata+"/lib/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP.r2.AxiomGT1.feature-effects");
00170 
00171   command += " ";
00172   command +=Util::joinVectorString(Util::addPrefixSuffix(file_prefixes,idata+"/cel/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/",".CEL"), " ");
00173 
00174   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00175   vector<string> gold,gen;
00176   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(file_prefixes,idata+"/p-geno-stages/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/doMultiChannelAxiom/cc-chp/", ".AxiomGT1.chp");
00177   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(file_prefixes, testDir + "/doMultiChannelAxiom/cc-chp/", ".AxiomGT1.chp");
00178   checks.push_back(new CalvinChpCheck(gen, gold, 0, L"apt-", 0.001));
00179   checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(testDir + "/doMultiChannelAxiom/AxiomGT1.calls.txt",
00180                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno-stages/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/doMultiChannelAxiom/AxiomGT1.calls.txt",
00181                                    0.0000001,
00182                                    1, 1, true, 0));
00183   checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(testDir + "/doMultiChannelAxiom/AxiomGT1.confidences.txt",
00184                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno-stages/Axiom_GW_Hu_SNP/doMultiChannelAxiom/AxiomGT1.confidences.txt",
00185                                    0.0001,
00186                                    1, 1, true, 0));
00187 
00188   RegressionTest brlmmTest(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00189   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00190   if(!brlmmTest.pass()) {
00191     Verbose::out(1, "Error in ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest::" + name + "(): " + brlmmTest.getErrorMsg());
00192     numFailed++;
00193   }
00194   else {
00195     numPassed++;
00196   }
00197 }

00199 
00200 /** Everybody's favorite function. */
00201 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00202   try {
00203     FsTestDir testDir;
00204     testDir.setTestDir("chipstream/data-step-qt", true);
00205     
00206     ProbeSetGenotypeStagesTest test;
00207     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00208     
00209     int testbirdseedflag, testbrlmmflag,testbrlmmpflag;
00210 
00211     testbirdseedflag=testbrlmmflag=testbrlmmpflag = 0;
00212 
00213     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00214 
00215     // APT-617: fails on all platforms.
00216     //test.doBirdseedSnp6Spf(); 
00217     if(Fs::fileExists("JUnitTestResults.qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf.xml"))
00218       Fs::rm("JUnitTestResults.qt-doBirdseedSnp6Spf.xml");
00219     test.doMultiChannelAxiom();
00220     
00221     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed));
00222     return test.numFailed != 0;
00223   }
00224   catch(...) {
00225       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00226       return 1;
00227   }
00228   return 1;
00229 }
